base_description: Rectangular white window with blue glass panes.
part_description: Two blue glass panes, white frame, handles on each pane, positioned side by side.
internal_interaction_description: The panes are held within the frame, with handles allowing sliding movement. The frame supports the panes structurally, ensuring they are securely fastened yet mobile for opening and closing.
external_interaction_description: The window can be opened or closed by a person using the handles. It allows light and air to pass through when open, while providing insulation and protection when closed.
